title: 怎么获得BBS的正版勋章

txt_content:

replies.author: crj125
replies.txt_content: 我有正版，却不知道怎么加

replies.author: Monsters
replies.txt_content: 我实在正版勋章申请帖子里得到的

replies.author: 熊孩子主义
深海
replies.txt_content:
发账号密码回复帖子,鹳狸猿会登录验证.详细步骤狂戳下方链接
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... D%B0%E6%D1%AB%D5%C2

replies.txt_content:
